KAKURI brand is a Japanese woodworking tool brand since 1946. KAKURI flagship model products select only the highest quality woodworker tool among many other quality woodworking tools in the KAKURI brand.

A Japanese sickle called "KAMA" is a convenient garden tool for weeding and harvesting vegetables. The razor-sharp edge cuts grass easily and quickly. KAKURI offers a variety of blade edges that are best suited for different types of grass and applications.
